TopicTitle: How to overcome the parachute bug?

Articles.Content:
First landed probe on Eve and I've tried everything I can to circumvent this bug. I've tried basically every parachute deploy method I can think of. And at this point I'm worried I just have to give up on it. Does anyone know a way for force deployment of parachutes in atmo?

Edited January 6 by Sammys Stuffs

Make sure you aren't time warping. Noticed on duna after I hit atmosphere, it didn't revert to 1x like ksp1.

Edit: not to say parachutes don't bug out occasionally... I encountered the big where only one parachute would open last night. Luckily it was redundant and I landed safely without it.

Edited January 12 by kdaviper
